metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21862 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple exploitable integer truncation vulnerabilities exist within theMPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Contentlibrary v1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input can cause an impropermemory allocation resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow that causesmemory corruption The implementation of the parser used for the “Xtra”FOURCC code is handled. An attacker can convince a user to open a video totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
